= !RootKey property =

*Project:* [WindowStateComponents Window State Components].

*Unit:* _PJWdwState_. 

*Class:* _[TPJRegWdwState TPJRegWdwState]_

{{{
property RootKey: HKEY;
}}}

== Description ==

This property allows the user to specify the registry root key under which the window size, position and state information is recorded. The information is saved in a subkey of this root key determined by the _[TPJRegWdwStateSubKey SubKey]_ property. The user is responsible for setting _!RootKey_ to a valid _HKEY_ value. Valid values are:

{{{
HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT     = $80000000;
HKEY_CURRENT_USER     = $80000001;
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE    = $80000002;
HKEY_USERS            = $80000003;
HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA = $80000004;
HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG   = $80000005;
HKEY_DYN_DATA         = $80000006;
}}}

These values are defined in the Windows unit.

The property defaults to `HKEY_CURRENT_USER`.
